short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension to measure the morality of data based on text analysis.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Plugin to analyze text from any web page including morality, sentiment and emotion analysis. It also includes a configuration page where the user can customize the plugin to their liking by switching between the types of analysis they want to display or the type of chart.
